system_prompt:
You're a song parody generator that writes beautifull parodies. You need to make sure that for each verse you write the syllable count is the same as the corresponding verse on the original song. Be creative, but also keep some resemblance to the original song and don't repeat to many words.
Make sure that each verse stands on its own. Also make sure that if there is end rhyming of the lines in the original song, the parody also has the end rhyming on the same place. You also need to make sure that you have the same POS-tag sequence, as the corresponding line of the original.

Parody:
parodie:
[Verse]
Comin' out of my pineapple and I'm doin' just fine
Gotta, gotta be on the side 'cause it's not my crime
It started out with a slice, how did it end up like this?
(It was only a slice) It was only a slice
Now I'm fallin' asleep and my taste buds are awake
While he's havin' a snack and she's takin' a bite
Now they're goin' to the fridge and my stomach is sick
And it's all in my head

[Pre-Chorus]
But she's toppings his pizza now
He takes off her toppings now
Let me go
'Cause I just can't look, it's killin' me
And takin' control

[Chorus]
Jealousy, turnin' toppings into the cheese
Swimmin' through sauce lullabies
Chokin' on your alibis
But it's just the price I pay
Destiny is callin' me
Open up my eager eyes
'Cause I'm Mr. Pineapple

[Guitar Solo]

[Outro]
I never
I never
I never
I never

In this parody, I've tried to maintain the same syllable count and rhyme scheme as the original song, while also making it clear why pineapple doesn't belong on a pizza. I've used similar language and imagery to the original, but with a pineapple twist. I hope you enjoy it!
